caption:
Traveling and hiking are 2 of my favorite activities and when I can combine them, it’s a great day! #ad

While visiting Hawaii again for work, I got away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki to test out the new Speedgoat 6 on a trail I’ve never done before. I love that these shoes can double as a travel shoe as well as one I know I can trust hiking in the rainforest (or anywhere)! 

About 1.5miles into this hike, the clouds rolled in and graced the day with a downpour. It’s not the first time I’ve been testing out a HOKA shoe on a trail and rain made an appearance! But how often can you hike through the rainforest while it’s actually raining? It was stunning, refreshing, and smelled amazing. I had no worries about comfort, traction or support because the Speedgoat 6 made sure every step was steady, supported and cushioned. I really put these shoes through their paces. 

I finished 5 miles of hiking, climbed over 1100ft of elevation in both rain and sun, and over varied terrain including wet roots, mud, rocks, dirt, thorny bushes, and leaves. I also found a beautiful flower that represented all the colors on my shoes. Nature IS the inspiration! The Speedgoat 6 really is the GOAT for trail runners and hikers!

To learn more about the Speedgoat 6, visit the @hoka website (link in bio)!
